about_the_game:
Escape Island

Welcome to the mysterious and exciting world of Oceania! Escape Island is a unique open-world adventure game that deeply explores survival and escape themes. After a mysterious ship crash, you find yourself stranded on a deserted island in Oceania. With no means of communication, you must struggle to survive and make critical decisions to navigate this challenging environment.

Explore and Build

Survival in Escape Island hinges on exploring the island and finding available resources. Dive underwater and scour the land for materials to craft tools, weapons, and shelters necessary for survival. Utilize your creativity by using the island's resources to create a suitable living space.

Combat Hunger, Thirst, and Dangers

Surviving won't be easy. Hunger, thirst, and dangerous predators constantly threaten you. Hunt for food, locate water sources, and contend with natural threats within the island's wilderness. Harsh weather conditions will also challenge you, requiring efforts to build natural or artificial shelters.

Escape Plans and Indigenous Challenges

Your goal in Escape Island is to formulate an escape plan to leave the island. Build rafts and embark on expeditions to find a cargo ship or another means of escape. Along the way, you'll encounter the island's indigenous inhabitants. Choose to engage in combat or form alliances with them as you progress.

Thrilling Adventure

Escape Island offers a thrilling adventure that tests your strategies and skills. Discover hidden secrets in the depths of Oceania and confront the most challenging obstacles to escape the island. Remember, survival depends not only on natural elements but also on navigating human interactions.

Survive in Escape Island

Immerse yourself in the unique world of Escape Island, enriched by realistic graphics and immersive gameplay. Take fate into your own hands, strategize your escape plan, and break free from the vast waters of Oceania!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

name: Escape Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

short_description: "Escape Island: An exciting survival adventure! Your mission: Escape from a deserted island full of dangers. Explore, hunt and collect resources to survive. But beware of lurking threats! Use your intelligence and skills to overcome obstacles and escape!"
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
